channel.title: CiTR -- Extraenvironmentalist
channel.description: Wednesday 1-2 p.m. (alternating weeks) Exploring the mindset of an outsider looking in on Earth. Such an outsider would be immediately struck by how unsustainable our social, environmental and economic systems are and would promote awareness of this problem while proposing alternatives. Featuring interviews with leading thinkers in the area of sustainable economics and our global ecological crisis.
